name: Amour Libre
storyline: Laura kissed a guy at a party a few days ago and she hasn't stopped thinking about him since. She'd like to see him again but Laura has a boyfriend. What will she do? Tell her boyfriend? See the guy in secret? Forget all about him?
summary:
A mouse only conversational game that explores the boundaries of relationships as a woman in a relationship finds herself physically attracted to a man she met at a party. 
 
Amour Libre is also known as Free Love.
